item.title: Sql Injection Union Attack Determining the Number of Columns Returned by the Query
item.description: from the lab description we know that there is SQL vulnerability in product category filter , to solve the lab we need to perform a union attack that determine number of columns let’s access the lab The website to display null values we need to use the payload ‘+UNION+SELECT+NULL– if 1 column in ther if 2 colums are there then we need tp use 2 NULLs so on i’ve started with null value and i got internal server error let’s try 2 same result let’s go for three
